title: Lords.of.the.Black.Sun-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:
  
                  Lords of the Black Sun (c) Arkavi Studios 

    Release Date :  9/2014                         Protection : Steam
    Discs        :  1                              Genre      : Strategy 

       
 
    Take command of one race to join the struggle for supremacy in the
    galaxy. As the leader of your empire you are tasked with exploring
    the stars, colonizing new worlds, managing your empire and conquering
    whoever dares to oppose you. 

      
   
   - Extract
   - Burn or mount the .iso
   - Run setup.exe and install
   - copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
   - Play   
     
   Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
   online ..
